content.question: A dart of mass <math alttext="m sub d " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> is launched straight upward toward a block of mass <math alttext="m sub b" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> that hangs at rest from a string, as shown in Figure 1. Immediately before the dart collides with the block, the dart has a speed <math alttext="v sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. The dart then collides with and sticks to the block, and the dart-block system travels upward to a height <math alttext="H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> before the system comes to rest, as shown in Figure 2. What is the change in momentum of the dart-block system immediately before the collision to the instant when the system comes to rest?

choices.label: <math alttext="negative m sub d, times v sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative, open parenthesis, m sub d plus m sub b, close parenthesis, times v sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>+</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative one half times, open parenthesis, m sub d plus m sub b, close parenthesis, times v sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mo>+</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="negative m sub d, times v sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
